#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
vector<string> v;
vector<string> :: iterator vt;
map<string, long long>m;
map<string, long long> :: iterator mt;
map<string, long long> :: iterator dt;
int main()
{
	long long n,i,max,done,prev;
	string str;
	max=1;
	scanf("%lld",&n);
	for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
		cin>>str;
		prev=1+m[str]++;
		if (prev == max) {
			cout<<prev<<' '<<str<<endl;
			max++;
		}
		
		/*if (prev++) {
			cout<<prev<<' '<<str;
		}*/
	}
}
